document_data.caption: A map showing Wagonslide Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Wagonslide Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Wagonslide Alley''' was a small alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Wagonslide Alley was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The alley originated on [[Seawatch Street]] where it branched west then southwest to end on [[Westwall Street]] after a short distance.
document_data.Description: The loose stones paving Wagonslide Alley caused many pedestrians to trip. Sea rime was quick to freeze here during the winter months, causing wagons to slip on the cobbles.
